title: 3 bedroom apartment*animals welcome*
posting_body: ['I am renting out a 3 bedroom 1.5 bathroom apartment.', 'The rent is $2600 per month plus utilities.', '(Electric, and any utilities you add.', 'Landlord pays water bill)', 'The house is right on the water near the border of CT and NY.', 'There is a living room, dining room, kitchen, and back porch.', 'There is also room for storage in the attic and large unfinished basement.', 'There is a grill on the back porch and a fire pit in the backyard.', 'The house is located on the Byram River so you can kayak, canoe and fish.', 'There is plenty of gardening space as well.', 'This is a family home and some things still need to be updated.', 'The landlord is willing to be flexible with rent if tenant is handy and wants to help out.', 'This can be discussed when coming to view the apartment.', "There is some furniture in the apartment that can be kept or removed depending on what you'd prefer.", 'There is a washer and dryer hook up right now and eventually will have a washer and dryer.', "I am just trying to arrange how it'll be dropped off.", 'Animals welcome!', 'The landlord is asking for first and last months rent no security deposit required.']
